The lines less traveled

NBN's guide to seeing Chicago on the 'L'

Emma Kumer

Video by Emma Kumer / North by Northwestern

Okay, admit it: You don’t go to Chicago as much as you’d like... And when you do, you often find yourself taking the Red Line to Grand and State only to hop off and walk the Mag Mile until you reach the Bean. Don’t worry – we’ve all been there. In fact, we’ve been there <i>too many</i> times. With the whole city only one Ventra scan away, take this as your opportunity to enjoy some of Chicago’s lesser-known haunts and hot spots.
